author: Global Desk
title: Tesla faces crucial test as Q1 earnings loom: Will the TSLA stock be a buy before April 22? Here’s what analysts say
description: Tesla’s quarterly delivery report, released earlier this month, showed that the company delivered 336,681 vehicles between January and March, falling short of Wall Street forecasts, which ranged from 360,000 to 370,000 units.
content: As Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ: TSLA) prepares to unveil its first-quarter 2025 earnings on April 22, market participants are watching closely. The results, due after the closing bell, are expected to offer c… [+4001 chars]
